title.narrative: The Future Sports Leadership Education, Tunesia

description.narrative: The overall objective of the project is to give a generation of young women and men the possibility to participate, achieve influence and enhance active citizenship The specific objectives are: ¿To enhance a democratic governance structure within the sport-for-all sector, that are advocating, promoting, training and facilitating network activities for young women and men all over Tunisia - To introduce and implement The Future Sports Leadership Education (DIF/Cross Cultures) - To encourage the formation of minimum 50 youth associations in accordance with `the Danish association model¿ that are driven by young leaders and that are organizing sport-for-all and other social activities for children and youth in local communities on a day-to-day basis - To facilitate network and joined activities between youth-sport-for-all programs in Tunisia and Denmark
